mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULE_CD, SCHEDULE_SERVER, REG_ID, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS regDt, TO_CHAR(CRE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS creDt, FROM TB_SCHEDULE_MANAGE ORDER BY SCHEDULE_CD
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SCHEDULE_MANAGE SET SCHEDULE_SERVER = #{scheduleServer}, REG_ID = #{modifier}, REG_DT = current_timestamp() WHERE SCHEDULE_CD = #{scheduleCd}
